content: I think it's a great idea to ask the community center for sponsorship. They might be willing to provide tennis balls or other equipment as prizes, which would be a fantastic addition to our event. I'll make sure to approach them in a clear and respectful manner, highlighting the benefits of their involvement and showing appreciation for their support. If they're unable to provide prizes, I can also consider reaching out to local sports stores, food and beverage providers, or even our company's management for sponsorship opportunities. Thanks for the suggestions!
